lines.gurmukhi: nvn gvn jl sIql Aml jYsy Agin aurD muK qpq mlIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Navan Gavan Jal Seetal Amal Jaisay , Agani Uradh Moukh Tapat Maleen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As water flows downwards and consequently remains cold and clear, but fire goes upward and therefore burns and causes pollution.

lines.gurmukhi: brn brn imil sill brn soeI isAwm Agin srb brn Cib CIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Baran Baran Mili Salil Baran Soee , Siaam Agani Sarab Baran Chhabi Chheen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Water when mixed with different colours also turns into same shades but fire that blackens ruin the complexion and beauty of all that comes in its contact.

lines.gurmukhi: jl pRiqibMb pwlk pRPuilq bnwspqI Agin pRdgD krq suK hIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jal Pratibinb Paalak Pradhulit Banaasapatee , Agani Pradagadh Karat Soukh Heen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Water is like mirror, clean and good doer. It helps in the growth of vegetation, plants and trees. Fire consumes and burns the vegetation and destroys them. Therefore, it is distressing.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD swD sMgm suBwv giq gurmiq durmiq suK duK hIn hY ]286]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Asaadh Saadh Sangam Soubhaav Gati , Gurmati Duramati Soukh Doukh Heen Hai ?286?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similar are the behaviour patterns of Guru-oriented and self oriented people. A Guru-oriented person gives peace and comfort to all since he lives under the refuge and direction of Guru; whereas a self-willed person is cause of sufferings for all because
